IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000001:
#b#cff0000ffâ  Move using mouse#nb#nc
Click left-mouse on the spot you want to move.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Move using keyboard#nb#nc
You can move your character by pressing keys below.
Forward : W
Backward : S
Leftward : A
Rightward : D

#b#cff0000ffâ  Walking#nb#nc
Press X. If you want to run again, then press X again.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Jumping#nb#nc
Press SPACE BAR when you want to jump.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000002:
#b#cff0000ffâ  Change view with mouse#nb#nc
You can view any direction just by rotating your mouse while pressing on the right button of the mouse.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Change view with keyboard#nb#nc
You can change view by pressing keys below.
Up : â
Down : â
Left : â
Right : â

#b#cff0000ffâ  For zoom in and out#nb#nc
you can use mouse wheel. Also Page Up, Page Down keys can be used for change view step by step. If you choose view expansion function from configuration menu then you can expand the view.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000003:
#b#cff0000ffâ  Whole map#nb#nc
Press M key to see the continent of Madrigal.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Mini-Map#nb#nc
Press N key to hide navigator on right corner. If you want to see it again, press N key again.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000004:
#b#cff0000ffâ  Normal Chat#nb#nc
You can only talk to users near by you. The way you talk is press Chat button on chat window.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Shout#nb#nc
You can talk to users who are in broad range. They way you shot is add #cffff0000/s #nc on front of the words that you want to say.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Party Chat#nb#nc
You can use it when you are in a party. The way you talk is add #cffff0000/p #nc on front of the wards that you want to say.
You can use Troupe button on the chat window.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Whisper#nb#nc
You can send message to certain user. The way you do it is add #cffff0000/w character name #nc.
You can use Whisper button on the chat window.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Guild Chat#nb#nc
You can use it when you are in a guild. The way you talk is add#cffff0000/g #nc.
You can use Guild button on the chat window.

#b#cff0000ffâ  System Message#nb#nc
All of the messages except chat message display in system window.To check press SYSTEM button on the chat window.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Filter Function#nb#nc
You can see the chat that you want to see. The way you do is press Filter button.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000005: #b#cff0000ffâ  Status Window#nb#nc\nYou can check HP, MP, FP, Exp of your character.\nShortcut key is T.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000006: #b#cff0000ffâ  Character Window#nb#nc\nYou can see information of your character. You can see all information of your character. You can also increase ability stat with GP points.\nShortcut key is H.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000007: #b#cff0000ffâ  On the top of inventory#nb#nc\n you can check items that you are equipped with. On the bottom it displays item and penya that you have. You can either double click or drag item to space when you want to equip.\nShortcut key is I.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000008: #b#cff0000ffâ  Quick Slot#nb#nc\nYou can put items or motions that you want to use quickly in F1~F9 slots and there are also expansion slot of 1~8.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000009: #b#cff0000ffâ  Quest Window#nb#nc\nThis is where you can see current quest information and the completed quests.\nShortcut key is Q.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000010:
#b#cff0000ffâ  Party#nb#nc
This is the exclusive system only FLYFF have which is similar to small size community that has same concept of party. It is divided in to two parties, one is one-act party which forms a normal party and the other one is Group party which can share the Exp points, set item give out method and use various skills.
To invite other characters to your party by typing #cffff0000/partyinvite character name #nc.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Party window#nb#nc
This is where you can see information about party members or type of party. 
Shortkey is P.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000011: #b#cff0000ffâ  Character Menu#nb#nc\nWhen you click #cffff0000Alt + Left click#nc to other character, variety of menu will show. Trade, Add to messenger, Invite to party, Follow, View equipment and Aid will be in the menu, so use it when you need it.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000012:
#b#cff0000ffâ  1:1 Trade#nb#nc
It is a method of trade when you give and take items or penya with other character. Click#cffff0000Alt + Left click#nc on other character and choose trade menu. It will ask other character if he wants to trade.

#b#cff0000ffâ  Private shop#nb#nc
You can sell your items to other users. When you press Start button, menu will show and when you choose private shop, private shop window will show. You can register name of shop and the items you want to sell then click OK button to start the private shop. If NPC is placed near by you, private shop will not open.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000013: #b#cff0000ffâ  Bank#nb#nc\nYou can use bank by clicking on public office NPC in each village. Click on deposit menu from public office NPC.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000014: #b#cff0000ffâ  Messenger#nb#nc\nYou can check for log in status of registerd users, channel and you can use chat easily. To register user click on + button on the messenger window, then enter the character name that you want to register.\nShortcut key is E.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000015: #b#cff0000ffâ  Emotion Expression#nb#nc\nYou can use this to express your emotion to other users. There are many emoticons and icons for expression various emotions, so you should try to use it.\nShortcut key is O.
IDS_CLIENT_TUTORIAL_CONTENT_000016: #b#cff0000ffâ  Cheer#nb#nc\nYou can earn cheer point every 1 hour you connect to the game. To cheer other character, select character that you want to cheer and open motion window(Shortcut key O) or Alt + Left click on character and choose cheer menu. Characters who get cheers get 5% EXP increase for 10 minutes.
